details: The script runs TensorFlow, likely a deep learning model, utilizing a single GPU with 8 cores allocated. It's submitted to a SLURM cluster for resource management. The script configures the SLURM job to run for a maximum of 10 minutes, utilize 8 CPUs (one task with 8 cores per task), and output to a file named 'slurm-cpu-%J.out'. It also sets up the environment by activating TensorFlow and then executes the TensorFlow command provided as an argument.
